86b8(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byong byang chub sems
87a1(yum): #dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba'i
87a2(yum): 'grib pa yang dag par rjes sum mthang 'de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzu
87a3(yum): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa
87a4(yum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
87a5(yum): bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
87a6(yum): nam lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems sa dpa' chen po
87a7(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
87a8(yum): pha rol du phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ nam lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chu
87b1(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem
87b2(yum): dpa' sa chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
87b3(yum): ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
87b4(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su
87b5(yum): ma mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang
87b6(yum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ni/ nam nu'i khams kyi 'grib pa yang
87b7(yum): dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su
87b8(yum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ nam me'i khams kyi
88a1(yum): pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sachen pa'i sa rab kyis la du phyin pa bskum
88a2(yum): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rlung gi khams kyi 'grib
88a3(yum): ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/
88a4(yum): ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam nam mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa ying
88a5(yum): dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab
88a6(yum): 'byer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su
88a7(yum): ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chu
88b1(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam ma rig pa'i 'jin pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub
88b2(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
88b3(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'du byed kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
88b4(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
88b5(yum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa shes pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
88b6(yum): po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
88b7(yum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam ming dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin/
89a1(yum): pa bskam pa yongs su rdzog par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'adzin pa zhes rab kyi rab tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
89a2(yum): namam skye mched drug gi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bsgom pa yongs
89a3(yum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam reg pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par
89a4(yum): rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
89a5(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam tshor ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ sa byang chub
89a6(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bskam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
89a7(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sred pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i
89b1(yum): / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzog par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem
89b2(yum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam len pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
89b3(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems
89b4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam srid pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
89b5(yum): ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems
89b6(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam skye ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub
89b7(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems
89b8(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rga shi'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
90a1(yum): sems dpa' chen pa shes rab pa rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
90a2(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
90a3(yum): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
90a4(yum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
90a5(yum): pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
90a6(yum): pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab
90a7(yum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa la spyod pa'im/ nam brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes sumaman
90a8(yum): ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
90b1(yum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rje su mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
90b2(yum): po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam shes
90b3(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasasu rdzogs
90b4(yum): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma
90b5(yum): mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems
90b6(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
90b7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
90b8(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
91a1(yum): dbyin pasgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
91a2(yum): nam stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yo
91a3(yum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// nam chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag
91a4(yum): par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub
91a5(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
91a6(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam don dam pa stong pa nyid 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes kyi pha
91a7(yum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'otshe/ nam 'dus
91a8(yum): byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs rjod
91b1(yum): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'dum byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag pa
91b2(yum): rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub
91b3(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de/
91b4(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
91b5(yum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
91b6(yum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
91b7(yum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rlab kyi pha rolatu
91b8(yum): phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ nam rang bzhin
92a1(yum): stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes ma mthong ba de'icha/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu/
92a2(yum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam chos thams cad stong pa nyid
92a3(yum): kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'du
92a4(yum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje/
92a5(yum): su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub
92a6(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba
92a7(yum): de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
92a8(yum): sems dpa' chen po rlab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma/ nam dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub chen
92b1(yum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa yang dag
92b2(yum): par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rabya 'byor byang chub sem
92b3(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// nam bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
92b4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub semadapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
92b5(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam tshad med pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su me mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
92b6(yum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs med pa'i
92b7(yum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
92b8(yum): pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'di
94a1(yum): 'phruro/ rab 'byung byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dang ldan thosas rab kyi ma du phyin pa spyod pa'i// namathams pan 'i rloms pa drug pa
94a2(yum): mayang dag par rjesam mthang ba \u0f7f/ byang chub sems da 'asems dpa'argyan pa zhes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa pazlam pa mangs sa rdzogs par 'ja'o// dpa'
94a3(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i
94a4(yum): 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
94a5(yum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag pa
94a6(yum): ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
94a7(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpal
94b1(yum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
94b2(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems chen po'i shes
94b3(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
94b4(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
94b5(yum): bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyu ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// nam mi 'jigs pa rnam
94b6(yum): kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro//
94b7(yum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'grib pa yang dag par rje
94b8(yum): su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems
95a1(yum): dpa' samam dang 'tshan thogs rab rtsa ba ram du phyin pa sa spyod pa ma/ nam nga sbyin pa 'phrub pa yang dgu pa rje sum mthong bar dzan/
95a2(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
95a3(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
95a4(yum): po'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
95a5(yum): nam thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
95a6(yum): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ nam lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid
95a7(yum): kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyu ro// rab 'byor byang
95a8(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong
95a9(yum): pa yongs su rdzogs
95b1(yum): ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rlab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem
95b2(yum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / chos ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong
95b3(yum): ngo / 'das zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong ma 'ongs zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / da ltar byung zhes bya bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong //
95b4(yum): dge ba zhes bya ba dang mi dge zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / lung du ston ces bya ba dang lung du mi ston ces bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / 'dus bya
95b5(yum): zhes bya ba dang 'dus ma byas zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / 'dod pa'i khams zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / gzugs kyi khams zhes
95b6(yum): bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / gzugs med pa'i khams zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag par
95b7(yum): rjesu mi mthong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong //
95b8(yum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu sbyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes ra
96a1(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba yang dag par rjesu mim thod/ bri stong ba
96a2(yum): ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes
96a3(yum): mi mthong / che bo stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus byas stong pa
96a4(yum): nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes mi mthong / mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid ces bya bar
96a5(yum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par
96a6(yum): rjesu mi mthong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes mi mthong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / rang gyi mtshan
96a7(yum): nyid stong nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
96a8(yum): ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ngo ma nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / dngos pa med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar
96b1(yum): yang dag par rje su mi mthong / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes
96b2(yum): mi mthong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong // dbang po rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / stobs rnams zhes bya
96b3(yum): bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya bar yang
96b4(yum): dag par rje su mi mthong / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / bsam gtan rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong
96b5(yum): tshad med pa rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / rnam par
96b6(yum): thar pa brgyad ces bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / thar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su ma mthong / rnam par thar
96b7(yum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rje
96b8(yum): su mi mthong / ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes mi mthong / gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes mi mthong / de bzhin na
97a1(yum): pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi 'jigs pa bzhi nas bya bar yang dag par rdzas su mi mthong / ma
97a2(yum): dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya bar rje su mi mthong / snying rje chen po zhes bya bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya bar
97a3(yum): yang dag par rje su mi mthong / thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rjes
97a4(yum): mi mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar yang dag par rje su mthong / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
97a5(yum): pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang gsog dang gsob dang / snying po med pa dang dang
97a6(yum): du gyur pa dang byed pa med pa dang srog med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rangab
97a7(yum): 'byer gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bas mgyis mi grub pa bstan pa/ tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// 'du gas pasam
97a8(yum): kyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bas sa kyis mi byam pa bstan to// 'du byed pamam gyis mi khyab pa'i phying bsas kyis mi khyab pa bstan to// rnam par shes pa pa ma chis ma cha
97b1(yum): pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan to// mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// rna ba bsum gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi
97b2(yum): khyab pa bstan to// sna bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// lce bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// lus pas
97b3(yum): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// yid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngas
97b4(yum): gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// dri bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab bstan to// ro bsam
97b5(yum): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// reg bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyi
97b6(yum): mi khyab pa bstan to// mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir sa
97b7(yum): gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyi
97b8(yum): khyab pa bstan to// lus kyis rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis
98a1(yum): mi khyab pa bstan to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis
98a2(yum): me khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi
98a3(yum): khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab
98a4(yum): pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rtse/
98a5(yum): gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsta
98a6(yum): to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan to// lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi
98a7(yum): khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// sa'i khams
98a8(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// chu'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// me'i khams bsam gyis mi
98b1(yum): khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// rlung gi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab
98b2(yum): ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ba'i phyir bsam gyis
98b3(yum): mi khyab pa bstan to// 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab bstan to//
98b4(yum): ming dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// reg pa
98b5(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// tshor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
98b6(yum): phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// len pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khya
98b7(yum): pa bstan to// skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// rga zhi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// sbyin pa'i
98b8(yum): pha rol tu phyin po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khya
99a1(yum): pa bstan to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis
99a2(yum): mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mkha bab bstan to// shes rab
99a3(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// phyi stong
99a4(yum): pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// stong pa nyid stong
99a5(yum): pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// don dam
99a6(yum): pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// 'dus
99a7(yum): ma byas snang ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i byer bsam gyis mi khyab
99a8(yum): bstan te// thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyi khyab pa bstan to// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
99b1(yum): bum gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
99b2(yum): phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam
99b3(yum): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// ngo bo nyid stong pa
99b4(yum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab bstan to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bas gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa
99b5(yum): bstan to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// yang dag par spong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa phyir bsam gyis mi khyab
99b6(yum): pa bstan to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// dbang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to/
99b7(yum): stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// byang chub kyi yan lag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to//
99b8(yum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab bstan to// 'phags pa'i bden pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam cu
100a1(yum): mi khyab pa bstan to// bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis ma khyab pa bstan to// tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bas
100a2(yum): kyis mi khyab pa bstan to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te/ rnam par thar pa brgyad pasam gyis mi
100a3(yum): khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// rnam
100a4(yum): bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// mngon par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab
100a5(yum): pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pastan to// ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// gzungs kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam
100a6(yum): mi khyab pa bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab
100a7(yum): phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// snying rje chen po bsam gyis
100a8(yum): mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to//
100b1(yum): thams cad shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis
100b2(yum): mi khyab pa bstan to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
100b3(yum): pa/ dum bu/ m+bu k+Shi pa/ bam po gnyis brgya bzhi pa// // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
100b4(yum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab par 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
100b5(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang
100b6(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol
100b7(yum): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa bsam gyis
100b8(yum): mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
101a1(yum): tu phyin pa la stod pa'i / gal mig pasam gyis mi khyab pa ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
101a2(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha
101a3(yum): rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna bsam gyis mi khyab ces
101a4(yum): bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ba'i cha/
101a5(yum): gal te lce bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
101a6(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sem
101a7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mangs
101a8(yum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ gal te gzugs pasam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'a
101b1(yum): shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
101b2(yum): gal te sgra bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
101b3(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dri bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub
101b4(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ro bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
101b5(yum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te reg bsam gyis mi khyab par 'du
101b6(yum): shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
101b7(yum): gal te chos bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
101b8(yum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
102a1(yum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ba
102a2(yum): gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol
102a3(yum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i rnam
102a4(yum): par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
102a5(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pab sam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa
102a6(yum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam
102a7(yum): gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab
102a8(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
102b1(yum): par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya
102b2(yum): bar 'dus shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smo
102b3(yum): pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab ce bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems
102b4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab
102b5(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus
102b6(yum): kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shesman shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
102b7(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi 'du shes bya ba sam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
102b8(yum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
103a1(yum): kyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems
103a2(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal rten pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du
103a3(yum): shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed
103a4(yum): pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
103a5(yum): byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal l+le'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
103a6(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
103a7(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshong ba bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes ra
103a8(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i// la
103b1(yum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o//
103b2(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa
103b3(yum): med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal
103b4(yum): te chu'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
103b5(yum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te me'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
103b6(yum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rlung gi khams bam gyis
103b7(yum): mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
103b8(yum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chu
104a1(yum): sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du
104a2(yum): shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal
104a3(yum): ma rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
104a4(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du khyen bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang
104a5(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab tu
104a6(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ming dang gzugs bsam
104a7(yum): gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
104a8(yum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub

104b2(yum): pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar du
104b3(yum): shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
104b4(yum): sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
104b5(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te len pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub
104b6(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
104b7(yum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya
104b8(yum): bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
105a1(yum): / gal tes 'i bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems pa/
105a2(yum): sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab
105a3(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshul khrims kyi
105a4(yum): rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'dra shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
105a5(yum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te 'azod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pasam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang
105a6(yum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te brtson 'grub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam
105a7(yum): kyi ma khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na zhes rab kyi ba rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab
105a8(yum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'drashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o//
105b1(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du she
105b2(yum): pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal
105b3(yum): te nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
105b4(yum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod/

105b6(yum): ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
105b7(yum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed
105b8(yum): po'o// byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes
106a1(yum): pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
106a2(yum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzonas par byed pa'o// byang
106a3(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na ni
106a4(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'dus ma byas
106a5(yum): stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
106a6(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
106a7(yum): yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
106a8(yum): ba saM gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi sa
106b1(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa

106b3(yum): med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
106b4(yum): gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sem
106b5(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes med na shes

106b8(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med
107a1(yum): med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snya
107a2(yum): pa'i tshe/ gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems da
107a3(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes

107a5(yum): bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
107a6(yum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol
107a7(yum): phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsam
107a8(yum): gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
107b1(yum): pal spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dbang po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
107b2(yum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs
107b3(yum): bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ga te byang chub kyi yan lagra rnams pasaM gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa

107b6(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chu
107b7(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bas ma~M gau tin bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi

108a1(yum): khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa me na nas rab kyi pha rol tu tshun pa sang su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen tha zhes
108a2(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam bsam kyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i
108a3(yum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khya
108a4(yum): bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
108a5(yum): pa'i tshe/ gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa
108a6(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med/

108a8(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
108b1(yum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces
108b2(yum): bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
