157a6(yum): kha ton byed par 'ad de/ bsgom par 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni bri bar mi 'dod klag par mi 'dod lung 'bog par mi 'dod kha don bya bar mi 'dod nyan pa
157a7(yum): mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor
157a8(yum): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni bri bar 'dod klag par 'dod/
157b1(yum): lung 'bog par 'dod kha ton bya bar 'dod nyan pa 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni thai bar mi 'dod lung 'bog par mi 'dod/ kha ton bya bar mi 'dod pa rnam par
157b2(yum): mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab
157b3(yum): 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa
157b4(yum): dang bral gnod se mi se dang snyoms pa dang / gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang / bral te theg tsom dang bral la/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/
157b5(yum): gnod sems dang snyoms pa dang / gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang bcas/ the tsom dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa zab
157b6(yum): mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
157b7(yum): bdud kyi la su rigs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang / skye gnod sems dang snyoms pa dang / gnyid dang
157b8(yum): 'gyod pa dang / the tsom dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang /
158a1(yum): kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
158a2(yum): gnar yang chos nyan pa 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bral gnod sems dang snyoms pa dang / gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang the tsom dang bral la/ chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang
158a3(yum): bcas gnod sems dang snyoms pa dang gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang the tsom dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dra
158a4(yum): lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lA su rig par bya'o//
158a5(yum): rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin
158a6(yum): du yid la byed pa'i tshe la la zhig der 'ongs te/ sems can dmyal ba'i mi snyan par brjod/ byol bong gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yid
158a7(yum): dgas kyi yul gyi mi snyan par brjod cing / sems can dmyal ba'i ni ltar sdug bsngal lo/ yid dgas kyi yul ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ byol mong gi skye
158a8(yum): gnas ni sdug bsngal lo// khyod kyis sdug bsngal 'di nyid mthar phyin par gyis shig/ gang la sdug bsngal stong phrag mang po nyam bu myong bar gyur pa'i bla na med
158b1(yum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya khyod yun ring po ra 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur ta re zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de yang shes ra
158b2(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dmi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sem
158b3(yum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang lung 'bog
158b4(yum): pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe la la zhig der 'ongs te rgyal chen bani'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod cing
158b5(yum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis legs par brjod/ mche ma'i lha rnams kyis legs pa brjod/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ 'phrul dpa
158b6(yum): lnga rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ gnan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs lha nye 'phar gyi lha rnam
158b7(yum): kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung snang gi lha rnams kyi legs pa
158b8(yum): tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjid/ chung dge'i lha rnam/
159a1(yum): kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa
159a2(yum): brjod/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ mi che ba
159a3(yum): lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi
159a4(yum): legs pa brjod/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye ched
159a5(yum): kyi lha rnams legs pa brjod/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi
159a6(yum): legs pa brjod cing / 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa la long spyod pas 'di ltar bde'o gzugs kyi khams ni bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
159a7(yum): 'di ltar bde'o// gzugs med pa'i khams ni snyoms par 'jug pa zhi ba rnams kyis 'di ltar bde'o// de dag kyang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal la bdag med do//
159a8(yum): rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can zad pa'i chos can 'jig pa'i chos can/ skye ba'i chos can/ 'gag pa'i chos can yin gyis 'di nyid du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
159b1(yum): 'bras bu thob par gyis shig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / ma phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig/ phyin cad
159b2(yum): 'khor ba nam 'khor bar gyis shig ces zer na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ngon
159b3(yum): byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
159b4(yum): chos smra ba ni cig pu ste zla med cing bdag gir byed pa yi na la/ chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
159b5(yum): pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
159b6(yum): bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gnan yang chos nyan pa ni cig pu ste zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos smra ba ni 'khor gyi nang
159b7(yum): na gnas na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za ba mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa
159b8(yum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni cig pu skye
160a1(yum): zla med cing bdag gi byed pa yin la chos nyan pa ni tshogs yong su bsdud na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bza' mo 'di
160a2(yum): 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyilacu
160a3(yum): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni cig pu ste zla med cing bdag gi byed pa yin lachos smra ba ni tshogs yongasu bsdud na/ rab 'byor
160a4(yum): de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems
160a5(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'di skad du nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba de shes rab kyi pha
160a6(yum): rol tu phyin pa 'di sbyin no zhes zer na/ chos nyan pa de ni phyi bzhin mi 'brang na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /
160a7(yum): lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// ra
160a8(yum): 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'dod la chos smra ba ni drung du 'gro ba'i skabs mi byed na rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha sa
160b1(yum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
160b2(yum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gnan yang chos smra ba ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par
160b3(yum): 'dod klog tu gzhug par 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir myur du 'gro bar ma
160b4(yum): mob na rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang
160b5(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni zang zid cung zad tsam gyi phyir shes
160b6(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar 'dod/ klag par 'dod lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod bsgom par 'dod nyan par 'dod la/ chos smra ba/
160b7(yum): ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa sbyin par mi 'dod/ thog tu gzhug par mi 'dod/ 'drir bzhug par mi 'dod srung 'bag
160b8(yum): mi 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par mi 'dod/ bsgom du gzhug par mi 'dod/ nyan tu gzug par mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
161a1(yum): pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyer mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud
161a2(yum): kyi lam su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gnan yang chos smra ba ni gang tu srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni der 'gro ba
161a3(yum): mi 'dod na/ rab ni 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub
161a4(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa gang tu srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro 'dan
161a5(yum): la/ chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod ma/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan/
161a6(yum): bste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la ma rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas dgon pa
161a7(yum): dang chu dgon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos ldan pa de ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
161a8(yum): ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//
161b1(yum): rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang na zas dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
161b2(yum): za ba mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lam su
161b3(yum): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zab mod pa dang chu mod pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa yang rjes su 'brang na des la
161b4(yum): 'di skad du rig kyi bya khyod zang zing gi don du song ste/ ci rlung legs par bsam pa sems par gyis shig/ zas thob ma tho ba dang / gsod mi gsod kyis 'gyod ta re
161b5(yum): zhes zer na/ de'i phyir chos ston pa des kyang thabs phra mos chos la spang ba byas par 'gyur te/ de yang mi dga' zhing 'di snyam du 'du shes te/ de ni sbyin par 'dod pa'i
161b6(yum): mtshan ma yin gyi/ spong ba'i mtshan ma yin no snyam na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i
161b7(yum): rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong chos
161b8(yum): smra ba ni/ gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang sbrul gyi 'jigs pa dang /
162a1(yum): 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa dag kyang chos kyi don tu chos kyis bsgom zhing rjes su 'brang na dge slong chos smra ba
162a2(yum): chos nyan pa de dag la 'di skad smras ste/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom pa'i 'jigs pa dang / rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan
162a3(yum): bo'i 'jigs pa dang sbrul gyi 'jigs pa dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod der dong ste/ ci rung nes de ltar dge slong chos smra ba des chos mi ston pa'i phyir shes
162a4(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par mi 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par mi 'dod lung 'bog tu gzhug par mi 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par mi
162a5(yum): 'dod/ nyan du gzhug par mi 'dod par gyur la/ de dag gis dge slong chos smra ba'i tshig de dag thos nas mi dga' ning mi dga' ba'i tshul can du 'gyur te/
162a6(yum): dge slong chos smra ba gang na ba der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton
162a7(yum): byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
162a8(yum): dge slong chos sba ba ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer btso bor byed par gyur te/ de bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor gyur pas/ bsod
162b1(yum): snyoms gtong ba'i grong de yang blta bar sems shing der yang dang yang du blta bas chos nyan pa'i phyir zlog cing tshe dang ldan pa dag ngas ni bsod snyoms gtang
162b2(yum): ba'i bla lta dgos te/ bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong du 'gro dgos so zhes nas des chos nyan pa de dag phyir zlog pa'i phyir 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes kyi
162b3(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
162b4(yum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing/ ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
162b5(yum): tu phyin pa za ba mo 'di pu 'ang 'dri bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lung 'bog par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid kyil byed par mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar tha
162b6(yum): sbyar ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du
162b7(yum): bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byang du bgyis shing ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bu'ang 'dri bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lung 'jon
162b8(yum): bar mi 'gyur ba dang / kha ton bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / tshul bzhin yid la bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de ltar thabs sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
163a1(yum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byang du byas shing 'di skad du nged kyis ji ltar khong du chud pa 'di ni shes
163a2(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yin te/ ji skad du khyed klog pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// zhes dbyen cing zlo ga la/ mos pa med par byed do// rab
163a3(yum): 'byor de la bdud sdig to can gyis de ltar dbyer byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' gang lung ma bstan pa de ni the tshom skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag the tshom du
163a4(yum): gyur nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar mi 'gyur/ mi klog par 'gyur/ lung mi gnod par 'gyur/ kha ton mi byed par 'gyur
163a5(yum): mi sdom par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog
163a6(yum): pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// ra
163a7(yum): 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ong ba shing / 'di da
163a8(yum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed par 'gyur te/ rgyun
163b1(yum): tra nags pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur
163b2(yum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// de ni rang sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro// nes zer na des tshig de thos nas shes
163b3(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ma
163b4(yum): ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang ye shes rab kyi pha rol
163b5(yum): tu phyin pa za ba mo 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bar chad du 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi las rmang du 'byung ste zadud kyi las mang du 'byung ste bdud kyi las de dag byang chub sems
163b6(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya'o// rig nas blang ba bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
163b7(yum): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bgyi ste/ blang bar bgyi ba de dag gang
163b8(yum): lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs rnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi/
164a1(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs rnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs rnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor
164a2(yum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs rnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs rnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor sbyin
164a3(yum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs rnyan ni bdud kyi las te/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam par spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
164a4(yum): nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste rnam par
164a5(yum): blang bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang don dam
164a6(yum): pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
164a7(yum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
164a8(yum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
164b1(yum): spong ba bani dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phagam pa'i lam lan lag brgyad pa dang
164b2(yum): 'phags pa'i bden pa pani dang / rnam par thar pa'i stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa gang gisad+hun
164b3(yum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang
164b4(yum): rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la nye bar skyer
164b5(yum): te de yang de dag la dga' ba bskyed na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu
164b6(yum): rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi labu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to/
164b7(yum): can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du lus gser gyi kha dog dang mi chen po'i mtshan gsum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan par byas shing / byang chub
164b8(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ong ste byang chub sems dpa' mos pa bskyed do// des mos bskyed nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nyams /
164b9(yum): / sna'i rnam par shes pa med do/ lce'i rnam par shes pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do// tshig gi 'dus te reg pa med do//
164b10(yum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa
164b11(yum): rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// lde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rab ma
164b12(yum): lus kyi 'dras te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// sa'i khams med do// chu'i khams med do// me'i khams med do//
164b13(yum): rlung gi khams med do/ na mkha'i khams med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// ma rig pa med do// 'du byed med do// rnam par shes pa med do// ming dang gzugs med na
164b14(yum): sgyu mched drug med do/ reg pa med do// tshor ba med do// sred pa med do// len pa med do// srid pa med do/ skye ba med do// rga shi med do/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do// tshul
164b15(yum): khribs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// bzod pa'i rol tu phyin pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
164b16(yum): do/ nang stong pa nyid med de/ gyi stong pa nyid med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do// chen po stong pa nyizhing med do// don dpa pa stong pa nyid mngon
164b17(yum): 'dug ba pa stong pa nyid med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med do// thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid med do/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma
164b18(yum): rang po gas stong pa nyid med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do// ngo bo
164b19(yum): nyid stong pa nyid med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med do/ yang dag par spong ba rnams med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam med do/
164b20(yum): dbang po rnams med do/ stobs rnams med do/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med
164b21(yum): bsam gtan rnams med do/ tshad med pa rnams med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do// rnam par thar pa brgyad med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i/
164b22(yum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa med do// mngon par shes rnams med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams med
164b23(yum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams medo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med do// mi 'jigs pa bani med do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med do// byams pa chen po ma
164b24(yum): snying rje chen po med do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do//
164b25(yum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do// dgra bcom pa nyid med do// rang byang chub med do// thams cad shes pa nyid med do// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid med
164b26(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do// rab 'byor gang la gzugs med pa de la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do// nyan thos
164b27(yum): med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo ste gang la tshor ba med pa de la ni sangs rgyas med do byang chub sems dpa' med do//
164b28(yum): rang sangs rgyas med do/ nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / gang la 'du shes med pa la sangs rgyas med do//
164b29(yum): byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do// nyan thos med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang ba nin gyis stod do/ gang la 'du
164b30(yum): byed med pa de la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad
164b31(yum): rang bzhin gyis spong ngo // gang la rnam par shes pa med la sangs rgyas med do byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do// nyan thos med do/ de ci'i phyi
164b32(yum): zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la mig med pa de la sangs rgyas med do byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do//
164b33(yum): spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobam lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam lan lag brgyad pa dang
164b34(yum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bani dang / rnam par thar pa'i stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa gang gis d+hAn
164b35(yum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang
164b36(yum): rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byang du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la nye bar snyer
164b37(yum): te de yang de dag la dga' ba bskyed na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu
164b38(yum): rkyer mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' bems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lamu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud ldag tu
164b39(yum): can dag sangs rgyab kyi cha byad du lus gser gyi kha dog dang mi chen po'i mtshan gsum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan par byas shing / byang chub
164b40(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po'i drung du 'ong ste byang chub sems dpa' mos pa bskyed do// des mos pa skyed nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'ams
166a1(yum): sna'i rnam par shes pa med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do// tshig gi 'dub te reg pa med do//
166a2(yum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg 'i
166a3(yum): rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sa rgor ba med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba mo
166a4(yum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sa tshor ba med do// pa'i khams med do// chu'i khams med do/ me'i khams med do//
166a5(yum): rlung gi khams med do// na mkha'i khams med do// rnam par shes pa'i kham pa med do// ma rig pa med do// 'du byed med do// rnam par shes pa med do// ming dang gzug pa me
166a6(yum): skyemached drug ba dang / reg pa med do// tshor ba med do// sred pa med do// len pa med do// srid pa med do/ skye ba med do// rga shi med do/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do// tshul
166a7(yum): 'bas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// bzod pa'i rol tu phyin pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
166a8(yum): nga stong pa nyid med do/ gyi stong pa nyid med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid med do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do// chen po stong pa nyid med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon
166b1(yum): 'du stong pa nyid med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med do// thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid med du/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma
166b2(yum): rang nan stong pa nyid med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do// ngo tsha
166b3(yum): nyid stong pa nyid med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams med do/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam med do/
166b4(yum): dbang po rnams med do/ stobs rnams med do/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do/ 'phagam pa'i bden pa rnams med do/
166b5(yum): bsam gtan rnams med do/ tshad med pa rnams med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do// rnam par thar pa brgyad med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i/
166b6(yum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa med do/ mngon par shes rnams med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams med na
166b7(yum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams medo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi med do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med do// byams pa chen po med
166b8(yum): snying rje chen po med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do//
167a1(yum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do// dgra bcom pa nyid med do// rang byang chub med do// thams cad shes pa nyid med do// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid med
167a2(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do// rab 'byor gang la gzugs med pa de la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do// nyan thos
167a3(yum): med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo ste gang la tshor ba med pa de la ni sangs rgyas med do byang chub sems dpa' med do//
167a4(yum): rang sangs rgyas med do/ nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chom thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / gang la 'du shes med pa la sangs rgyas med do//
167a5(yum): byang chub sems dpa' med do/ rang sangs rgyas med do// nyan thos med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stod do/ gang la 'du

172b6(yum): nyan thos med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe mngarab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa de la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub
172b7(yum): sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do// nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams can ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med
172b8(yum): pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do nyan med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
173a1(yum): // / gang la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid med pa de la sangs rgyas med do byang chub sems dpa' med do/ rang sangs rgya ba med do nyan thos med do// ci'i phyir zhe na/
173a2(yum): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la dran pa nye bar gnag pa med pa de la sangs rgyas med do byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do nyan
173a3(yum): thos med do// de ci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la yang dag par spong ba rnams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub sem
173a4(yum): dpa' med do rang sangs rgyas med do nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / gang la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med pa de
173a5(yum): la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang ba nin gyis stong ngo //
173a6(yum): gang la dbang po rnams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med de nyan thos med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos than
173a7(yum): cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la stobs rnams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir
173a8(yum): zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang ba ni ni gyis stong ngo // gang la byang chub kyi yan lag rnam med pa de la sangs rgyas med do byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med
173b1(yum): na thos mdang / ranga'aphyir ne na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong // gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 'amed bde la mangs rgya medang/ bya
173b2(yum): sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do nyan thos med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang banin gyis stong ngo // gang la 'phags pa'i bden pa
173b3(yum): rnams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
173b4(yum): gyis sdod do/ gang la bsam gtan rnams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyab med do nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
173b5(yum): 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / gang la tshad med pa rnams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do byang chub sems dpa' med do/ rang sangs rgyam med do nyan
173b6(yum): thos med do// de ci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / gang la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med pa de la sangs
173b7(yum): rgyus med/ byang chub sems dpa' mdang/ rang sangs rgyas medade/ nyan rnam med da de pa'i phyir nen/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
173b8(yum): stong ngo / gang la rnam par thar pa brgyad med pa de la sangs rgyas med da/ byang chub sems dpa' med de/ rang sangs rgyas med do// nyan thos med da/ da'i
174a1(yum): zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong po/ gang la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med pa de la sangs rgyas

174a6(yum): ne na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / gang la ting nge 'dzin rnams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ byang chub sems dpa' med do//

174b1(yum): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub sems dpa' med do/ rang sangs rgyas med do/ nyan thos med na/ nga ci'i phyir rten

174b5(yum): med pa de sangs rgyas med do byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la

174b7(yum): cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rgyur tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med pa de la sangs rgyas med do byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do nyan thos mod de ci

175a1(yum): na/

175b1(yum): chang du 'gyur ba mang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang lus 'jog pa dang
175b2(yum): ton byed pa dang ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa deng ga la bar chad du 'gyur ba meng ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ni
175b3(yum): po che gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be du ru dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang sele sbram gang ci snyed gcig 'byung ba de
175b4(yum): ni bar chang du 'gyur ba mang zhing phyir rgol ba mang po dag go// rab 'byor de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za
175b5(yum): mo 'di 'bri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la'ang bdud kyi las mang po'i byung
175b6(yum): bar 'gyur ro// bar chang mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyir rol bar mang po'i byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das
175b7(yum): de ni de bzhin te/ bde bar gshegs pa de mi bzhin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling rin po ni gser dang / nor bu dang / mu ga dang / byi rlu dang / dngul dang
175b8(yum): sa le sbram gang ci snyed cig mchis pa de dag ni bar chang du 'gyur ba mang zhing sar rgol ba mang ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu
176a1(yum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bos pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / sngon
176a2(yum): pa dang / rdul bzhin du ma la byed pa de dag la'ang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ bar mang mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// slar rol ba mang po 'byung
176a3(yum): 'gyur ro// ngo ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klon
176a4(yum): pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgying ba dang / ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag la bar chad bgyid pa ni bdud kyis byin gyis rlabs
176a5(yum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi buza gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba za mo 'ang 'je ba dang / klog pa dang / lung
176a6(yum): 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgying ba dang tshul bzhin du yid bgyid pa de dag gi bar chad bying pa de dag ni b+h+yo rgya shin tu chung bar 'gyur te// sangs rgyas kyi chos
176a7(yum): rlabs po che dag la sems mi 'jug go// de ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi 'dri mi klog lung mi 'bog khe dor mi gying mi sgom tshul bzhin du yang la
176a8(yum): mi bgyid do// gzhan 'bri zhing klog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dag la'ang bar chang bgying bar 'gyur ro//
176b1(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni

176b3(yum): pa de dag gi bar byed pa de dag ni bdud kyi byin gyis rlabs pa theg pa lagasal tu zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa bam bskyed pa dge ba'i rtsa bam bskyed pa dge
176b4(yum): rtsa ba shin tu chung ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs sum zin pa sha sta ga byung ste/ rigs kyi bu dang

180a2(yum): phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas ldan 'das gang ji snyed ci'i/ bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kya 'am rigs kyi bu'am
180a3(yum): rigs kyi bu ma dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang ga 'a ton bya ba dang / tshul bzhin
180a4(yum): du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing mtsho sbyong
180a5(yum): ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton bya ba
180a6(yum): dang / ston pa dang tshul bzhir du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// shar lo'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
180a7(yum): skyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de ga gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba dang /
180a8(yum): klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton bya ba dang bstan pa ngang tshul bzhin du yi la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs
180b1(yum): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi zung nga rigs kyi bu ma de dag gis shes
180b2(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba dang klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yang la zla ba'i phyir gongs
180b3(yum): mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
180b4(yum): me de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za ba mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / bstan pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la
180b5(yum): bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing mtsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu

180b7(yum): tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba
180b8(yum): dag kyang rigs kyi khu dang rigs bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa za ba mo 'di bri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton
180b9(yum): bya dang bstan pa dang / tshul pa ma du ma la rgya 'gyur mangs pa ma nga/ phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
180b10(yum): po phyir mi ldog tu ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di 'bri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa
180b11(yum): bstan pa ngang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do// lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
180b12(yum): bo phyir mi rdzogs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu dang rigs bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dri ring klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ngon byedapa
180b13(yum): dang / ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do// nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems
180b14(yum): dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi buro shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang lung 'bog pa
180b15(yum): dang kha don bya ba dang ston pa dang / tshul ba ring du yi la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do// byang phyogs kyi byang chu
180b16(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa

180b24(yum): dag kyang rigs kyi khu dang rigs bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton
181a1(yum): za dang bsan pa dang / tshul ban du 'a 'a sangs pam / thugs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems
181a2(yum): po phyir mi ldog tu ji sred pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di 'dre zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa

181a6(yum): dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang lung 'bo ga pa

181a8(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang
181b1(yum): grung 'bog pa dang kha ton bru ba dang ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag gi dod cu brtson par byed ci'i yongs su 'dzin par byung / bya
181b2(yum): phyog 'tshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bung nga rigs kyi du ma shes rab kyi
181b3(yum): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba zhing klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yingal byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson
181b4(yum): par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pade
181b5(yum): dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang ston pa dang / tshul

181b7(yum): sems dpa' chen phyir mi ldog par gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang
181b8(yum): lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'jid byed do// nub byed
182a1(yum): marnam A sh+tsa d+hA rlu @
182a2(yum): kyi bum shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi pa'i dri 'ang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang 'dod byed pa dang stod pa dang / rnal ba 'ing du ying la byed pa de dag gi ngam
182a3(yum): brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do// 'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag
182a4(yum): gi rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu me de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / sdon pa dang

182a6(yum): cher po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi zung nga rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing sgrub pa dang lung 'bog pa dang /
182a7(yum): 'jor byed pa dang / stor pa dang / rdul ba'i ni du ya la byed pa dengs gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do// rab 'byor 'di la ste
182a8(yum): dab ma thung me la mchis la bu lnga'am bcu'am nyi Ta'am gsum bcu'am lnga bcu'am brgya'am su thams mngon/ de dag nim chi nas kyang mchi bar
182b1(yum): bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed cing bdag gi mji ltar na nang med par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di la ji ltar na bar mang du mi 'gyur/ bang gcag gi ma
182b2(yum): nas ringes du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ bang gcag gi ma 'di ring du 'tsho bar bya na ci ltar bya/ bdag cag gi ma 'di lus la mi bde ba'i nyams med par bya
182b3(yum): lngar bya/ 'di'i ni bdag cag skyed bskyed pa ste/ srog gi sbyin ba ga go nas de dang ma de lar mi 'gro legs par bya bas legs par byed do// de dag ni
182b4(yum): 'di'i srog gi bar chad du 'ong ngo // lus la sha sbrang dang sbrang bu dang sbrul gyis gtse ba'i mi bde bas ba bdu 'ong ngo // tsha ba dang grang ba dang bkres pa dang
182b5(yum): skom pas mi bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes phu dung du legs par byas pas phu drung du byed do/ de lta bu de dag ma de la 'di ni bdag cag skyed bskyed pa'o/
182b6(yum): 'di ni 'jig rten 'di ston ba'o zhes dang ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rgyan tu rim gro byed cing bsti ba stang dang / bkur sti cher byed do// rab 'byor de
182b7(yum): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spya
182b8(yum): gyis rtag tu rgyun mi chang par gzigs shing dgongs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bde gcag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos
183a1(yum): rnams par snang bskyed pan/ 2sa rnam panas rgyun tu mas shing mngasas/ byugs kyi 'jig
183a2(yum): gyi khams gang+gA'i yar klung gi byed ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji ste cig bzhugs
183a3(yum): shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'ang la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rgyun
183a4(yum): mi chad par gzigs shing dgongs so// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i dartsi klung gi byem snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
183a5(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
183a6(yum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za ba mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyur mi chang par gzigs shing dgongs so// nub phyogs kyi
183a7(yum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ba'i klung gi byed ma snyed ngag mang bzhi gshegs par gri zotsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ji snyed tsa ba
183a8(yum): zhi 'tsho skyong ba dang chos so pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dngas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo'ang la sangs rgyas kyi spyar gyis te/
183b1(yum): hu rgyun mi chad par gzigs shing dgongs so// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
183b2(yum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stong pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
183b3(yum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyur mi chud par gzigs shing dgongs so// byang shar gyi phyogs
183b4(yum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i ba'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
183b5(yum): gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las
183b6(yum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gzigs shing dgongs so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi
183b7(yum): khyem snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa grwa bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing tshe snang ba dang chos ston
183b8(yum): sangs rgyas de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi chang par gzigs shing glongs so// lho nub
184a1(yum): kyi phyogs mthams kyi jigs ched gyi khams ga rlung gi bye skyed dang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam
184a2(yum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing dgongs so// nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams gang
184a3(yum): 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong pa
184a4(yum): dang chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das reg kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sa rtag tu rgyur mi chang par
184a5(yum): gzigs shing dgongs so// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
184a6(yum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes
184a7(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi sbyar gyis rtag tu rgyun mi ring par bzigs shing dgongs so// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig
184a8(yum): can gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed ngag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bcugs
184b1(yum): shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi sbyar gyis rtag tu rgyun mi chang par bzigs shi
184b2(yum): dgongs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyeng bskyed pa'o// rnams
184b3(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'di'ang ston ston pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
184b4(yum): rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi rang par gzigs shing dgongs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
184b5(yum): las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa gra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di las
184b6(yum): 'byung ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyir pa'o// 'di las 'byung ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di las byung ba ni bzod pa
184b7(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di las byung ba ni phye stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni stong pa nyid stong
184b8(yum): pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni chen po stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni rgyu dang stong pa nyid ngo // 'di las byung ba ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid /
184b9(yum): 'di las 'byung ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol ta phyi pa'o// 'di la'i byung ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di las byung ba ni nad stong pa nyid rdo/ dadangs pa ma mchen dzadze// 'di las byung ba
185a1(yum): khyong las byung ba ni 'dus ma byas sung pan dang // 'dulas byung bdim mtha' las 'das pa dang pan dang / 'di las byung ba jugs
185a2(yum): dang ma med pa stong pa nyid // 'di las byung ba ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid // 'di las byung ba ni rang ba zhi stong pa zhing ngo // 'di las byung ba ni chos
185a3(yum): thams cad stong pa zhing ngo / 'di las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid pa stong pa nyid // 'di las byung ba ni mi dmigs pa stong pa zhing ngo // 'di las byung
185a4(yum): ba ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// 'di las byung ba ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidang ngo //
185a5(yum): las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sa// 'di las byung ba ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni d+hA rdul gyi rkang pa
185a6(yum): brnams so// 'di las byung ba ni dbang ba rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni stobs rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag
185a7(yum): so/ 'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang ba'o// 'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bdon pa rnams so// 'di las byung
185a8(yum): bzlasam gtan rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni tshad med pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa rnams//
185b1(yum): 'di las byung ba ni rnam par tharapa brgyang ngo // 'di las byung ba ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par lag pa gu'o// 'di las byung ba ni rnam par
185b2(yum): thar pa'i sa stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// 'di las byung ba ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gu'o// 'di las
185b3(yum): kha ni rnam par thar pa'i sku stong pa/ 'di las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni sa
185b4(yum): kye sgo rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa rnams so// 'di las byung bam
185b5(yum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni snying rje chen po'o// 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dzes pa rnams so// 'di las
185b6(yum): byung ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// 'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ 'di las byung ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o
185b7(yum): 'di las byung ba ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di las byung ba ni rang byang chub po// 'di las byung ba ni las kyi rnam par shes pa nyid / 'di las byung ba ni bla na med
185b8(yum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// 'ong las byung ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams so// 'di
186a1(yum): las byung gyur ma 'ong ba rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni dgra bcom pa rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas
186a2(yum): rnams so/ 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
186a3(yum): sangs rgyas rnams te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
186a4(yum): zab mo 'di la rten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o//
186a5(yum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
186a6(yum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog par dang lung 'bog cing kha tor byed pa dang / bsgom pa ngang tshul banin du yid la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang de
