241b4(yum): zhes byar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'asapa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
241b5(yum): zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las bla stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa
241b6(yum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten
241b7(yum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig
241b8(yum): rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa zhes bya bar ston
241b9(yum): shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong
242a1(yum): / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor gnan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de
242a2(yum): bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid
242a3(yum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nying stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'dzi/
242a4(yum): rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
242a5(yum): rna ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya bar ston to//
242a6(yum): lus kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba
242a7(yum): ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sa dri'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid sdong pa zhes bya
242a8(yum): bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes byang ston to// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'ag
242b1(yum): na rdzab cad stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnga ba'i rnam pa shes pa'i 'jig rten jo bo cad stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo ba
242b2(yum): pa zhes bya bar ston to// rje'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten rngab nying stong pa zhes bya bar ston
242b3(yum): // yid kyi rnam par zhes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
242b4(yum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te/
242b5(yum): reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
242b6(yum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cho blo'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
242b7(yum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bu'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'a
242b8(yum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
243a1(yum): bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cho ba'i 'jig rten rdob tshad stong pa zhes bya bar ldan to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba
243a2(yum): ston to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid spong pa zhes bya bar ston to// me'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rte
243a3(yum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo za nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
243a4(yum): bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar smo to// 'du byed kyi 'jig tan ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston no// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig
243a5(yum): rten ngo bo nyid stong pa rtse zhes bya bar ston to// ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten ngo ba cad spyod pa zhes bya
243a6(yum): bar ston to// rig pa'i 'jig rten rnga pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten rdzo brjid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid spyod pa
243a7(yum): zhes bya ba btsun to// me pa'i 'jig rje rdo 'i 'a snang bzhes bya bar spyod to// sring ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid spong pa nas bya bar snyan na// skye ba'i 'jig dan dus
243a8(yum): sa kyi na/ ngos nga nas kya rtson te/ gyung pa'i ba sa byang ba'i dzin ta ba cing byung ba nas bya bar rdzum
243b1(yum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'grus kyi pha
243b2(yum): rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol
243b3(yum): tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa
243b4(yum): zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
243b5(yum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig

243b7(yum): rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// thog ma dang tha med pa stong ba nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
243b8(yum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo ba
244a1(yum): stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten sang ba cad
244a2(yum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes par ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
244a3(yum): to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
244a4(yum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dbang
244a5(yum): po rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig

244b2(yum): ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnam
244b3(yum): kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
244b4(yum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig

245a1(yum): shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor
245a2(yum): gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

247a1(yum): kyid spyod pa zhes bya bar spyon to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin du'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nas bya bar stan to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'dzig
247a2(yum): rten dngos po me pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rte
247a3(yum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te// chen po stong pa nyid kyi

247b3(yum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po ma pa
247b4(yum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi
247b5(yum): 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams
247b6(yum): kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to//
247b7(yum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis 'jig rted dngos pa
247b8(yum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bam gtan rnams kyis 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshad med pa'i rnams kyi
248a1(yum): 'jig rten dngos po med pa'ang bo nyid stong ba zhes bya ba ston// gzugs pad pa rnams pa ga pa rnams kyi 'jig rgyad du srupa nga
248a2(yum): ngab ltang stong ba zhes bya bar sbyar te// u ba nga pa brgya kyi lag tu ngas pa mdapa' nga spyong ba zhes byab sta te// maTha gyis gnas pa'i sems pa sa
248a3(yum): ya gA 'jig rgyad dngos pa meng pa'i bo gang sbyang pa nas bya bar spyod// rnam par byu sa stong pa tung dang man rnam med pa dang smon pa nang pa'i 'jig rten sa pa
248a4(yum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig
248a5(yum): rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa
248a6(yum): stobs bcu'i 'jig can dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mi 'jigs pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i jo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
248a7(yum): se ga nga smra sa med shA skye sa zu sa / ngas pa b+h+yo na rdzas de mang shAdun nga
248a8(yum): bya ba gas// pa ma pa 'i ci stong gis bya bar rjo // sangs rgyas kyis ma 'dres pa bca brgya kyi 'jis
248b1(yum): po med pa'i ra ba da spyad pa zhes bya bar sbyar te/ rgyu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'dig ngos po med pa 'du ba nyid stong pa nas bya bar snyed / lhan cig byang
248b2(yum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po mang po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
248b3(yum): zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
248b4(yum): pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten du
248b5(yum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor/
248b6(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
248b7(yum): bya bar ston to// 'dugs kyi 'jig rten gi nas bya bar ston no// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar snyan /
248b8(yum): mig gi 'jig rted gi nas bya bar ston to// rnga ba'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'gatan ni nis bya bar smin to// su'i 'jig rten na zhes bya bar snyan /
249a1(yum): lus kyi 'jig rten gi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rted gi mas bya bar stonan// gzugs kyi 'jig rtenan zhes bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten nim
249a2(yum): bya bar stan \u0f7f/ tra~M'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten ni nas bya bar ston to// ga gi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya ba
249a3(yum): ston to// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ni nas bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ni nas bye
249a4(yum): ston to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten nam
249a5(yum): bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ni
249a6(yum): zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ni nas bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ni rjes par ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig
249a7(yum): rten na nas bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rted ni zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya ba

250a1(yum): / sa sa gas bya/

253b8(yum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid
254a1(yum): ces bya bar ston to// dang byang chub ste 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi 'jig cen stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/
254a2(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten
254a3(yum): smon pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum bu dag thopa/ bam po nyes brgya bcu gcag pa// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten
254a4(yum): ji ltar ston ce na/ ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su yang mi 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
254a5(yum): ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba 'am/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
254a6(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i srad du che bar gnas so
254a7(yum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don lnga pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gnas
254a8(yum): du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das
254b1(yum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyi pa 'dzin do chen pa'i ya gnas so// rab 'byo sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
254b2(yum): pa 'di ni don bsam gyes mi khyab pa'i phyi bar gnas pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes ra
254b3(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gnal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so//
254b4(yum): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin nem rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
254b5(yum): rnams kyi don chen po ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba'i don to// rab 'byor rnam grangs nges na
254b6(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chen po'i nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na
254b7(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dron bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /
254b8(yum): drung cing dang / thams cad mkhyen pa cid ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na ther bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la
255a1(yum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'ablor rje ltar nases rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don pa
255a2(yum): tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can du sdug bsngal ba la gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid
255a3(yum): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag par nus pa de la bu gang yang med do// rab 'byor rnam grangs des ma zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ba na dgra bcom
255a4(yum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo marnal du med pa'i phyir nye bar ba
255a5(yum): pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang 'byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du med de/ sus kyang gzhal
255a6(yum): bar mi nus so// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sras rgyus rnams kyi don gas
255a7(yum): du meng pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byorade
255a8(yum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mi mnyam pas mnyam pa yang su yang med na/ lhag pa lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor
255b1(yum): rnam grangs des nags rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dmami mjam pa dang mnyam pa'i bya
255b2(yum): nye bar gnas so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis
255b3(yum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab
255b4(yum): 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang 'byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rab 'byor sangs rgyas
255b5(yum): nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang 'byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med de/ mi mnyam pa dang
255b6(yum): mAnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba'ang bsam
255b7(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'du shes kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
255b8(yum): mam ma dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'du byed kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam pa
256a1(yum): shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dngag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mig kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
256a2(yum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rna ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'a
256a3(yum): sna yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor kye yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/
256a4(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lus kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor yid kyang bsam
256a5(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
256a6(yum): pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sgra yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
256a7(yum): tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ro yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab
256a8(yum): 'byor reg kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa
256b1(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
256b2(yum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis
256b3(yum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal tu med pa ste/
256b4(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab
256b5(yum): 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang bas
256b6(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam
256b7(yum): mu pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab kyis mi khyab dpag tu myed pa ste/ maM mnyam dang mnyam pa'o// rabo 'byor 'i la
256b8(yum): te reg pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
257a1(yum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor yi kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
257a2(yum): pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rna ba'i
257a3(yum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
257a4(yum): ba'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang bsam gyis mi
257a5(yum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
257a6(yum): gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa skye
257a7(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mam pa'o// rab 'byor bsamasa'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
257a8(yum): chu'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mchim pa'o// rab 'byor ma'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dngag tu
257b1(yum): med pa gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rlung gi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
257b2(yum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor na mkha'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nam
257b3(yum): par shes pa'i khams kyang bsnam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ma rig pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
257b4(yum): tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'du byed kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam dang mnyam
257b5(yum): pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ming dang gzugs kyang
257b6(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mchis pa'o// rab 'byor skye mched drug kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa'o/
257b7(yum): sa pa sa ya 'o// 'thang ga pang basmram thos rgyab nga myed mdu ba ba ste/ sems pa ma ma ma
257b8(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnas du med paste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab byeng seng pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa
258a1(yum): ste/ mi mam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor len pa yang bsam gyis mi khya ba dpag tu med pa gnas du med pas/ mi ma ma dang mnyam par
258a2(yum): rab 'byor srid pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gal tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor skye ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnas
258a3(yum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rga shi yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
258a4(yum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang
258a5(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
258a6(yum): bste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol dun pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med bya ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//
258a7(yum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin phyi ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
258a8(yum): bya yang bsum gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi bya ba dpag tu ma
258b1(yum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor phye stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//
258b2(yum): rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bas
258b3(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
258b4(yum): pa ste/ mi mnyam dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ston don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
258b5(yum): da'o/ rab 'byor 'dus byas slong ba nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas
258b6(yum): stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong nyid kyang bas
258b7(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
258b8(yum): tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
259a1(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mims pa dang mnyam
259a2(yum): pa'o/ rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan cid
259a3(yum): stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi minyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis ma
259a4(yum): khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
259a5(yum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
259a6(yum): rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bamam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dran pa
259a7(yum): nye bar gnag pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams ca
259a8(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med/
259b1(yum): gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang ma
259b2(yum): pa'o// rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang bsam gyis mi byab dpag du med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
259b3(yum): kyang bsam gyis mi byab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang bsam gyis mi
259b4(yum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du
259b5(yum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kying bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam dang mnyam pa'o
259b6(yum): rab 'byor tshang meng pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
259b7(yum): 'jug pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi b+hab dpag tu med gsal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang bsam gyis mi
259b8(yum): khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang bsam gyis mi
260a1(yum): byab ga me gnas mang bas mi sem pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ma pa thang banas sa ba cing nga mtshams med dang smon pa mang pas
260a2(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dngag tu med gnal du medapa ste/ ri mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mngon pa sa pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
260a3(yum): gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa zhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
260a4(yum): mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzud kyi sgo rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de ban
260a5(yum): gshegs pa ni rnams kyang bsam gyi mi khyab dpag tu med gnal tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang bsam gyis
260a6(yum): mi bya ba dpag tu med gzul du meng ba ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi byab dpag tu med
260a7(yum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor byams pa chen po yang bsam gyis mi bya ba dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
260a8(yum): yadang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor snying rje chen po yang bsam gyis bya ba dpag tu med gan du med pa ste/ mimam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sangs rgyas
260b1(yum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang bas
260b2(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du med gnal du med
260b3(yum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhanal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang ma
260b4(yum): pa'o// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang
260b5(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mam pa'o// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dang
260b6(yum): tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
260b7(yum): ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//

265a4(yum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bur shog shi ga/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du
265a5(yum): bdag gis kyang tshags yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'di chos ji ltar ston pa de bzhin du khadag gis kyang chos bston par bya'o zhes
265a6(yum): de de la 'dod pa bskyed pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
265a7(yum): 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su
265a8(yum): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag byang chub sems dpa' brgya pag du ma byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma/ byang
265b1(yum): chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
265b2(yum): pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
265b3(yum): la spyod pa de lta bu dag nye bar ston te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la 'dod pa skyed par 'gyur ro// des de dag la 'dod pa skyed
265b4(yum): nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yong su nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za ba mo 'di 'dri ba dang /
265b5(yum): klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang
265b6(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma
265b7(yum): 'di la gzugs med do/ tshor ba med do// 'du shes med do// 'du byed med do// rnam par shes pa med do// mig med do// rna ba med do// sna med do// lce med do// lus
265b8(yum): med do yid med do// gzugs med do// sgra med do// dri med do// ro med do// reg med do// chos med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do/
266a1(yum): / sna'i rnam par shes pa med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do// tshig gi 'dus te reg pa med do/
266a2(yum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa
266a3(yum): rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba med
266a4(yum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sa tshor ba med do// sa'i khams med do// chu'i khams med do// me'i khams med do//
266a5(yum): rlung gi khams med do// na mkha'i khams med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// ma rig pa med do// 'du byed med do// rnam par shes pa med do// ming dang gzugs medan
266a6(yum): skye mched drug med do/ reg pa med do// tshor ba med do// sred pa med do// len pa med do// srid pa med do/ skye ba med do// rga shi med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do// tshul
266a7(yum): khyabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// bzod pa'i rol tu phyin pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
266a8(yum): rang stong pa nyid med do/ phyi stong pa nyid med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do// chen po stong pa nyid med do/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon
266b1(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
266b2(yum): pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
266b3(yum): pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtsham med pa dang min pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
266b4(yum): mnyam pa drang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du meng ba ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
266b5(yum): yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gtan gyi mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so//
266b6(yum): rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshes
266b7(yum): pa'i stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams
266b8(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsam
266'a1(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dag
266'a2(yum): tu med pa nal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi maH
266'a3(yum): pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi ma mnyam pa dang
266'a4(yum): mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmi
266'a5(yum): so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'phyar
266'a6(yum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyi mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid bsam
266'a7(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gas
266'a8(yum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste
266'b1(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
266'b2(yum): dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das rje'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang ma
266'b3(yum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs lags/
266'b4(yum): ci'i slad du 'du shes bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed
266'b5(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi
266'b6(yum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs lags/ ci'i slad du mig bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
266'b7(yum): gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i spang du rna ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
266'b8(yum): shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ji'i slad du sna bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang ma
267a1(yum): pa mid dmigs pa lags ci'i slang duchubs mdzes mi byab pag tus mchis gnas dum mchis shing mi mangs pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
267a2(yum): lags/ dri'i slang du lus bsam gyis ma khyab dpag tu mar chis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mjam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rje'i srad
267a3(yum): yid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnam du ma mchis gling mi mnyam pa dang maHma pa mi dmigs pa 'grus/ rdzi'i srang dwagags bsam gyis mi khyab ras
267a4(yum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i srad du sgra bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
267a5(yum): shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i srad du dri bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ma
267a6(yum): dmigs pa lags/ rje'i srad du ro bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis gling mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri sa
267a7(yum): du reg pasam gyis mi khyab dngag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mdzem pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdo'i slad du chos bsam gyis mi khyab
267a8(yum): dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dang
267b1(yum): sus su du
267b2(yum): sem pa dngangs pa migs pa nas rjesu du su seMs las mi dang su
267b3(yum): da so
267b4(yum): sems nga mi dgasu mas sa sus ya sa ngas kyimi sa su du
267b5(yum): pa ses kyis ni lung da su 'is ngas tshu dus so ma
267b6(yum): sa sa su mi dus sa sa'i sa ma
267b7(yum): du/ seM rjes sa ma sa
267b8(yum): du sa'i so 'i sa seM kyis du ba dang mams na du
267b9(yum): sum su sams
267b10(yum): la dus sa mi semasang das mas
267b11(yum): yang dus sa she 'i sas nga sa 'i sa
267b12(yum): ya nga mas dus sems nga
267b13(yum): pa lags/ su du pa'i lus sa so so
267b14(yum): bad dgyes pa la sa su su sa sa ya rjes so so
267b15(yum): sa sa du sa ni nga
267b16(yum): sa sa kyi sa
267b17(yum): tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ d+hi'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
267b18(yum): gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du snga'i rnam pa par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma
267b19(yum): mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis pa zhing
267b20(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ tI'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa
267b21(yum): dang mnyam pa mi dmig pa lags/ ji'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis pa gatshul du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
267b22(yum): mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang na bu rnga mi dmigs
267b23(yum): lugs/ rje'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmag pa la
267b24(yum): ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dzi
268a1(yum): srad du sa'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing minyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
268a2(yum): ci'i sangad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
268a3(yum): slang du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji
268a4(yum): slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis gshing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmir
268a5(yum): pa lags/ dri'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam dang ma
268a6(yum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyer gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mi mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
268a7(yum): pa mi dmigs pa lags d+hi'i srad du lce'i 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa
268a8(yum): dang mnyam pa lags/ ci'i srad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyun gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam
268a9(yum): piyig
268b1(yum): pa dang mnyam pa lpags/ ci'i slad du yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du mi mchis shing mi ma
268b2(yum): de migs
268b3(yum): pa dang mnyamu pa lugs/ ji'i slad du sa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam ma pa mi dmigs
268b4(yum): pa lags/ rje'i slad du chu'i khams bsam gyis gya mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
268b5(yum): lags/ dri'i srang du mo'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmig pa lags
268b6(yum): rdzi'i slad du rlung gi khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i srad
268b7(yum): du na mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du
268b8(yum): rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad
268b9(yum): du ma rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du 'du
269a1(yum): khye pas kyis ga la sa thanas rnam pa shing mam mtsham pa mi dmigs pa lags sra ya sa
269a2(yum): ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tum mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyas pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdo'i skad du ming dang gzugs pasam
269a3(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gsu du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rje'i srad du skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
269a4(yum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slad du reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
269a5(yum): mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rje'i srad du tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa
269a6(yum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ d+hi'i srang du sred bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis pa gnal du ma mchis/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
269a7(yum): dmigs pa lags/ d+hi'i srang du lem pa bsamam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mu ma sa gling mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i spang
269a8(yum): du srad pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam po dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slang du bsam gyis mi
269b1(yum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gragal du ma mchis shing mi mAnyaswa pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ti'i srang du na shi bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu ma mchi
269b2(yum): gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa las/ ji'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
269b3(yum): gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i skad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mam
269b4(yum): gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gas
269b5(yum): du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
269b6(yum): gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa las/ d+hi'i slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchi
269b7(yum): gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i srad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
269b8(yum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma ma
270a1(yum): gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i srad du bruM stong pa nyid bsam gyis rmi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal
270a2(yum): du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i srad du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mim
270a3(yum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
270a4(yum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mam pa mi dmigs pa
270a5(yum): lags ji'i srad du don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i slang
270a6(yum): du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis gang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du 'dus ma
270a7(yum): snong pa nyid dusam gyis ma tha ba dpag tu ma mchis glan la du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ hU~M skang du mtha' las bu steng ba
270a8(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis garnal du mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rje'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa cid /
270b1(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab pag tu med ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmig phra lags/ ji'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis
270b2(yum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis pa gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dang /
270b3(yum): tu ma mchis gzhal du mA man+tis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
270b4(yum): mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu maman
270b5(yum): gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhil
270b6(yum): du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis ma gnal du
270b7(yum): ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
270b8(yum): shing ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam m+bi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shi
271a1(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang mi dmigs pa lags/ rje'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du
271a2(yum): ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa 'gas/ ji'i skad du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis
271a3(yum): shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rje'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
271a4(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i spadu dbang po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang
271a5(yum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i skad du stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa ste ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
271a6(yum): pa lags/ rje'i srad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri/
271a7(yum): srad du 'angags pa'i lam yan brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis granal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slang du/
271a8(yum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du bsam gtan
271b1(yum): rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis shing gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi migs pa lags/ dri'i srad du tshad med pa rnams bsam gyis
271b2(yum): ma khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis
271b3(yum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyi
271b4(yum): me khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
271b5(yum): gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du thar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gan
271b6(yum): du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
271b7(yum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rje'i slad mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
271b8(yum): shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
272a1(yum): / pa lags/ ji'i srad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mamachis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slad
272a2(yum): / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slad du mi 'jigs pa dran
272a3(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rje'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa bani bsam gyis mi khyab
272a4(yum): dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i srad du byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma ma
272a5(yum): shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i srad snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa me
272a6(yum): pa lags/ rnyi'i slad sangs rgyas kyi myo 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa legs/ rje'i slad du rgyud du
272a7(yum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i smad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
272a8(yum): bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab
272b1(yum): dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
272b2(yum): ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam mnyab mi dmigs pa lags/ rje'i slang du rang byang chubasam gyis me khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang
272b3(yum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa maM
272b4(yum): dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dam
272b5(yum): pa lags// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum bu bgro lnga pa/ bam po brgya bcu gnyis pa// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
272b6(yum): rab 'byor la 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang / minyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang ba dang mi mnyam pa dang ma
272b7(yum): pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du shes bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du byed la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa
272b8(yum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa mi dmis so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig la'ang
272b9(yum): mnyam pa nga
273a1(yum): / bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mam
273a2(yum): pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna la 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa
273a3(yum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lula'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor

273a8(yum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang ma mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab
273b1(yum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa

273b4(yum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi

273b7(yum): ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dngo tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang bas
273b8(yum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa
274a1(yum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig
274a2(yum): so// rab 'byor snga'i 'dus te ga pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dag pa dang tsha dang mnyam pa dang ma mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa

274b8(yum): dmigs so// rab 'byor na shil 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyar ba ri dmigs so// rab 'byor sbyar ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ba
