277b3(yum): dmigs pa lags/ ji'i srad rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs// dri'i slang du mig la'ang bsam pa dang
277b4(yum): dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dzi'i slad du rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
277b5(yum): lags/ dri'i slang du sna la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad pa dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dzi'i srang du lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
277b6(yum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i srad du lus la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i
277b7(yum): slad du yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang ngo ma mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i sra du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa
277b8(yum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang bas mtshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du dra la
278a1(yum): / bsam pa dang dag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ pa'i srang rol bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmag
278a2(yum): pa lags/ ji'i slad du rig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa las/ dri'i slang chos la bsam pa rlapag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi
278a3(yum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i sladu mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i slang du
278a4(yum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yabasam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i swadu sa'i rnam par shes pa la bas pa pa dang dpag pa
278a5(yum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
278a6(yum): lags ji'i slad du lus kyi 'dus rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i srang du yid kyi rnam pa
278a7(yum): shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang pi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang
278a8(yum): mnyam pa dang ma mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du rna ba'i 'das te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
278b1(yum): lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i srang du lce'i 'dus te reg pa la
278b2(yum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i spud du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya
278b3(yum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lag
278b4(yum): dzA'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus
278b5(yum): ta reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa nga mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
278b6(yum): ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag
278b7(yum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
278b8(yum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ri'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
279a1(yum): ci'i slad du me'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
279a2(yum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad dus khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang cad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs lags/ rje'i slad du
279a3(yum): tshwa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// tri'i srad du rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tsha dang ma
279a4(yum): pa dang dmi mnyam pa lugs/ dri'i srad du mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rje'i slang du rnam pa
279a5(yum): shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i srad du ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang
279a6(yum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i srad du 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
279a7(yum): skad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags rje'i skang du ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag dang
279a8(yum): na dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i skad du skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tsha dang mnyam pa dang mi mkham pa mi dmigs pa la/
279a9(yum): dri'i slad du reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mAnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg pa la bum pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa
279b1(yum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i srad du tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i srad du sred pa la
279b2(yum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i srad du len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
279b3(yum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang ma mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du
279b4(yum): skye ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dzI'i srad du rga shi la bsam gyis mi pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
279b5(yum): mnyam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
279b6(yum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i srang du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang ma mnyam pa mi dmig
279b7(yum): ba lags/ ji'i srad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi migs pa legs dzI'i srad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
279b8(yum): phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
280a1(yum): tshang nga mnyam pa dang sa mnyam pa me migs pa 'gas/ ji skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tun pa la bsas pa dang pag pa dang na dang mnyam pa dang mas
280a2(yum): nga mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slang du nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdo'i slad du byi stong pa nyid la
280a3(yum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i srad du phye nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
280a4(yum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i srad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsdam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad
280a5(yum): chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag
280a6(yum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa ma
280a7(yum): pa lags/ ji'i srangad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slad du mtha' la
280a8(yum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa
280b1(yum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chud dang mam pa dang mi mnyam pa
280b2(yum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du
280b3(yum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la
280b4(yum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
280b5(yum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmi
280b6(yum): pa lags/ ji'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i slang du dngos po med pa
280b7(yum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gabasam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i skad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la
280b8(yum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad/
281a1(yum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i srad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam sa dang mi ma
281a2(yum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du stobs rnam
281a3(yum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa
281a4(yum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
281a5(yum): pa lags/ rdzi'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i slad du bsam gtan
281a6(yum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i slad du tshad med pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
281a7(yum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa nyi tshigs
281a8(yum): lags/ rje'i srad du rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slad du mthar gyis
281b1(yum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i srang dum par thar pa'i sgo stong pa'i
281b2(yum): dang mtshar ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams la
281b3(yum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi darimigs pa 'gas/ dri'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang ma
281b4(yum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa 'gas/ ji'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa la
281b5(yum): dzi'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du mi 'jigs pa
281b6(yum): rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i srang du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang
281b7(yum): pa dang tshang dang ma'am pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags d+hi'i srang byams pa chen po la bas ma dang dpag pa dang cang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi nga
281b8(yum): pa lags/ ji'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ dri'i slad du sangs rgyas
282a1(yum): kyi chos ma 'dres paco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang char rang mnyam pa dang mi mngamar mi nyam pa mi dmigs
282a2(yum): ba lags/ ci'i srang du rgyun du zhungs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa rang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang ma'am dang mi ma ma pa mi dmigs pa 'a
282a3(yum): rje'i slad du lam cing phyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang cha tshang dang malam ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdo'o slang
282a4(yum): du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dbag pa dang tshad dang ma'am ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rdzi'i sdang du dgra bcom
282a5(yum): nyid la bsam pa dang dngagra pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ji'i slad du rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa ched dang ma
282a6(yum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ rje'i slang du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dbag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa ma
282a7(yum): dmigs pa gas/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam mi dmigs pa lags
282a8(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'aka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo 'di ngasam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med la gnal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam ba
282b1(yum): ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
282b2(yum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
282b3(yum): so// rab 'byor 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu maud gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam
282b4(yum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi mtshams so// rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi
282b5(yum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par
282b6(yum): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam
282b7(yum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/
282b8(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi mnyam dmigs so// rab 'byor na pa'i
283a1(yum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba la bsam pa dang / dpas
283a2(yum): pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
283a3(yum): pa ste/ de'i phyir sna la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang chad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
283a4(yum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rang /
283a5(yum): 'byor lus kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad
283a6(yum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
283a7(yum): de'i phyir yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med/
283a8(yum): la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sgra'i/
283b1(yum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang ma nyam pA mi dmigs
283b2(yum): so/ rab 'byor dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dri la bsam pa dang dpag po dang tshang dang
283b3(yum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ro'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
283b4(yum): phyir ro la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi ma dmigs so// rab 'byor reg gi ngo bo nyidi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
283b5(yum): med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos kyi ngo bo
283b6(yum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos la bsam pa dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
283b7(yum): dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
283b8(yum): phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo
284a1(yum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du m+b+hi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang
284a2(yum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzham
284a3(yum): du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang chud dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
284a4(yum): 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi minyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes
284a5(yum): pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mi mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis ma
284a6(yum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mi mnyam pa myi ma
284a7(yum): ramigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
284a8(yum): phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig 'dus te reg pa'i ngan
284b1(yum): bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa lA/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang
284b2(yum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi
284b3(yum): mAnyam+ba pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i
284b4(yum): 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la
284b5(yum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
284b6(yum): med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
284b7(yum): dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med bzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
284b8(yum): phyir lus kyis 'dus te rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo//
285a1(yum): kho nying bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus reg pa la bsam
285a2(yum): pa dang dpag pa dang dpag tha dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo 'di bsam
285a3(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo 'ang
285a4(yum): bsam gyis tshor bral bas bya ba dang dpag rgyang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
285a5(yum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyos mi khyab dpag tu mong gzhil du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam
285a6(yum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyi bsam gyis mi khyab
285a7(yum): dpag tu med gnal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
285a8(yum): pa dang mo ma'am pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rkyen ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/
285b1(yum): mi ma'am pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dag pa dang tshad dang ma'am pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
285b2(yum): so// rab 'byor lus kyis 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
285b3(yum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te dag
285b4(yum): ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
285b5(yum): rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
285b6(yum): dpag tu med gnal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa ma
285b7(yum): dmigs so// rab 'byor chu'i khams kyi ngo bo 'ong bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi ma'am po mi dmigs pa ste/ de'i phyir chu'i khams
285b8(yum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mo'i khams kyi ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
286a1(yum): gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir me'i khams pa bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi ma
286a2(yum): mi pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rlung
286a3(yum): gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang ma'am pa dang mi ma'am pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis ma
286a4(yum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
286a5(yum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang man
286a6(yum): pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi ma'am pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ma rig pa'i
286a7(yum): bo nying bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
286a8(yum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang ma'am
286b1(yum): ba ste/ rgyu de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo 'a
286b2(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
286b3(yum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ming dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyidi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
286b4(yum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor skye mched drug
286b5(yum): gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i skye ba mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad
286b6(yum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste
286b7(yum): de'i phyir reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
286b8(yum): med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mcho la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
287a1(yum): 'byor sred pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dbab tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred pa la
287a2(yum): brlabag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor len pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam
287a3(yum): ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sred pa'i ngo bo 'ang bsam gyis
287a4(yum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
287a5(yum): rab 'byor skye ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba la sa bsam pa dang dpag pa
287a6(yum): rang rangag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rga shi 'ong bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi ma
287a7(yum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyings shi'i la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshar dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
287a8(yum): phyin pa'i ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang
287b1(yum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med/
287b2(yum): gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi ma
287b3(yum): pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
287b4(yum): ste/ de'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor brtson 'grus pha rol tu
287b5(yum): phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu medat+pa la mI mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
287b6(yum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
287b7(yum): du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
287b8(yum): pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
288a1(yum): pa ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
288a2(yum): rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid
288a3(yum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
288a4(yum): tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
288a5(yum): so// rab 'byor byin nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi nang
288a6(yum): stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam byas
288a7(yum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
288a8(yum): mnyam pa dang ma mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi
288b1(yum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
288b2(yum): rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la
288b3(yum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rib 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab
288b4(yum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
288b5(yum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa
288b6(yum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
288b7(yum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mtha'
288b8(yum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang ma'am pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stod
289a1(yum): pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mo khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rdzog ma dang
289a2(yum): med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
289a3(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
289a4(yum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab rlung ba nin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
289a5(yum): skye/ de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa 'ad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad spong pa
289a6(yum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa 'di la bsam pa dang
289a7(yum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang gi mtshar spong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
289a8(yum): dpag pa tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
289b1(yum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
289b2(yum): ste/ de'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong
289b3(yum): pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag
289b4(yum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam dmigs so// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
289b5(yum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'di stong
289b6(yum): stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid lta bsam pa dang
289b7(yum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
289b8(yum): gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
290a1(yum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yang dag pa slong ba rnams kyang bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa
290a2(yum): rang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi ma dmigs so// rab 'byo
290a3(yum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mjam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi
290a4(yum): rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mau dam pa rnams kyi ngo bo 'ang bsam gyis
290a5(yum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi ma'am pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dag pa dang nang dang mnyam pa dang mi
290a6(yum): ngamanyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
290a7(yum): pa ste/ de'i phyir stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dbug pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag
290a8(yum): rnams kyi ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam
290b1(yum): la ba sam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
290b2(yum): pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
290b3(yum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
290b4(yum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
290b5(yum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang /
290b6(yum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshad med pa/
290b7(yum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshad med pa rnams la bsam pa dang
290b8(yum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
291a1(yum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
291a2(yum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpas
291a3(yum): tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mi mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
291a4(yum): dmigs so// rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
291a5(yum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
291a6(yum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo sdong pa nying dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyi mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang ma'am paste
291a7(yum): de'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa lha bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
291a8(yum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnam
291b1(yum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
291b2(yum): du med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
291b3(yum): pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo 'ong bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste
291b4(yum): de'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i
291b5(yum): stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
291b6(yum): bcu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
291b7(yum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mi 'jigs pa bani la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang tshad dang mnyam pa
291b8(yum): dang mi ma'am pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bani ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam
292a1(yum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bani la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa ming
292a2(yum): dmigs so// rab 'byor byams pa chen po'i ngo bo 'ong bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang ma rnam pa ste/ de'i phyir
292a3(yum): byams pa cher po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mjam pa dang mi ram pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sring rje chen po'ang bo 'di bsam gyis mi bya
292a4(yum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang ma'am pa ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang cheng dang ma'am pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
292a5(yum): dmigs so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang
292a6(yum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
292a7(yum): 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang ma'am pa ste/ de'i phyir rgyur du nus
292a8(yum): pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo'i
292b1(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang
292b2(yum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
292b3(yum): gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa ma
292b4(yum): dmigs so// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa dang gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
292b5(yum): de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid
292b6(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
292b7(yum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la
292b8(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lam gyis rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
293a1(yum): rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bla skam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang ma'
293a2(yum): ba ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang rlung dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha tu phyin
293a3(yum): pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum bu phamams/ bam po gnyis brgya bcu pan // rab 'byor de dza snyam du sems/ gzugs gang ban
293a4(yum): gyis mo khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa te/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmigs su yong ngam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyi mi khyab
293a5(yum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dmigs su yong ngam/ 'du shes gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
293a6(yum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mo mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du shes dmigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
293a7(yum): ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
293a8(yum): mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmigs su yong ngam/ mig gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mo nyam pa dang mnyam pa de
293b1(yum): sA gang bsam gyis mi kya ngazag tu med gsal tu med pa
293b2(yum): mig dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba gang bsam gis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba dmigs su yod dam/
293b3(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna dmigs su yod dam/ lce gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam de
293b4(yum): la lce dmigs su yod dam/ lus gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus dmigs su yod dam
293b5(yum): yid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus dmigs su yod dam/ yid gang bsam gyis mi
293b6(yum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid dmigs su yod dam/ gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
293b7(yum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmigs su yod dam/ sgra gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
293b8(yum): dang mnyam pa de la sgra dmigs su yod dem/ dri gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dri dmigs
293b9(yum): su yod dam/ ro gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ro dmigs su yod dam/ reg gang bsam gyis
294a1(yum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg dmigs su yong ngam/ chos gang bsam gyis
294a2(yum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis
294a3(yum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi rnam par shes pa de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su
294a4(yum): yod dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i rnam pa
294a5(yum): shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang ma'am pa
294a6(yum): de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhil du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
294a7(yum): pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
294a8(yum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
294b1(yum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang
294b2(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su yong dam
294b3(yum): mog gi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu me gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi 'dus te reg
294b4(yum): pa dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
294b5(yum): de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
294b6(yum): pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
294b7(yum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod ngam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
294b8(yum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang
295a1(yum): bskum gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su yod dam/
295a2(yum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis mtshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi 'dus
295a3(yum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
295a4(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i dmigs su yod ngam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su
295a5(yum): yong ngam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang ma'am pa de la sna'i 'dus
295a6(yum): te reg pa'i rkyenar gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
295a7(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis
295a8(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yong ngam/ yid
295b1(yum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nga la yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i
295b2(yum): rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ sa'i khams gang bsam ngo pog tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sa'i khams dmanas
295b3(yum): su yong ngam/ chu'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chu'i khams dmigs su yod dam
295b4(yum): me'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rlung gyis khams dmigs su yong dam/ mamakha'i
295b5(yum): khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la na mkho'i khams gang dmigs su mong ngam/ rnam par
295b6(yum): pa'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su yong ngam/ mchog
295b7(yum): pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ma rig pa dmigs su yong ngam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis mi
295b8(yum): khyab dpag tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmigs su yong ngam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa ste/ mi ma
295b9(yum): gas
296a1(yum): pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/ ming dang thugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
296a2(yum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ming dang gzugs dmigs su yod dam/ skye mched drug gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
296a3(yum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye mched drug dmigs su yod dam/ reg po gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
296a4(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg pa dmigs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa de la
296a5(yum): tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ sred pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sred pa dmigs su
296a6(yum): yong dam/ len pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la len pa dmigs su yod dam/ sred pa gang bsam
296a7(yum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam po dang mnyam pa de la skye ba dmigs su yod dam/ rga shi gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
296a8(yum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rga shi dmigs su yod ngam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
296b1(yum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
296b2(yum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/
296b3(yum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
296b4(yum): dmigs su yod dam/ brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la brtson
296b5(yum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigasu yod dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
296b6(yum): pa de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
296b7(yum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam/ nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
296b8(yum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nang stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ phyi stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
297a1(yum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par la phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
297a2(yum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnying stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
297a3(yum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ chen po stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
297a4(yum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
297a5(yum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyam
297a6(yum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang
297a7(yum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ mtha' las
297a8(yum): 'das pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mo khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mtha' 'das pa stong pa nying dmigs
297b1(yum): su yod dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mam
297b2(yum): pa de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
297b3(yum): pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod ngam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
297b4(yum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi
297b5(yum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
297b6(yum): 'di ste gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/
297b7(yum): mi mtshams pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nying
297b8(yum): dmigs su yod dam/ dngos po pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po med pa stong pa
300a1(yum): dgra bcom pa'i 'jos su dang ma gyis mi khya dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi ranyam pangang mnyam pa de
300a2(yum): zhwa sa ya gyu pas sa rgyas mi byung bas sa mang gnal dra bang pa sna/ ma ma
300a3(yum): mnyam pa de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su yong dam/ dgra bco pa 'dadi dmigs su yong ngam/ rang byang chub gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu me/
300a4(yum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam de la rang byang chub dmigs su yod dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
300a5(yum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lam gyi rnam pa nyid dmigs su yong ngam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khya
300a6(yum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing dmigs su yong dam/ bsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
300a7(yum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs 'dis chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o
300a8(yum): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// dpag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o/
300a9(yum): chang dang bral ba'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o// mnyam pa dang mi ma'am pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang ma'am pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des mcho
300b1(yum): thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'ang
300b2(yum): ngag ni bsam pa las 'das pas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// dpag pa las yongs su 'das pas na dpag tu med pa'o// tshad las yongs su 'das
300b3(yum): pas na gzhal du med pa'o// mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas na mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya
300b4(yum): ba 'di ni bsam du med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor dpag tu med ces bya ba 'di ni dpag tu mi rung ba'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor gzhal du med pa
300b5(yum): zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad med tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam pas mnyam pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//
300b6(yum): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu me gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam
300b7(yum): gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// dpag tu med ces bya ba ni nam mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro// bzhal du
300b8(yum): med ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir ro// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
301a1(yum): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa mi mnyam pa dang ma'am pa ste/ dngag ni lA
301a2(yum): mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsam pa 'am/ dpag par mi nus te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhal du med do// sangs rgyas
301a3(yum): kyi chos rnams ni gzhal du med do// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / gzhal
301a4(yum): du med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam pa
301a5(yum): grol lo// dge slong ma brgya phrag nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge bsnyen pa stong phrag drug bcu dang / dge bsnyem
301a6(yum): phrag sum bcus ni chos rnams la rdul dang bral ba'i chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// byang chub stong phrag nyi shus ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/
301a7(yum): de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid las sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstam do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
301a8(yum): stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bsum bcu bzhi'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
301b1(yum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba 'di ni zab pa sa
301b2(yum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slang du nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don tshad ma mchis
301b3(yum): pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
301b4(yum): pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
301b5(yum): slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
301b6(yum): pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi
301b7(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don tshad med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o//
301b8(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zas
301b9(yum): mo 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni nang stong pa nyid 'dus so// phyi stong pa nyid 'dus so// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus so// stong pa nyid stong pa zhing 'dus so//
302a1(yum): chen po stong pa nyid 'dus so// don daM pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus so//
302a2(yum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// rang bzhin stong pa 'di
302a3(yum): 'dus so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po med pa stod
302a4(yum): pa nyid 'dus so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// dran pa nye bar gzhig bzhi 'dus so// yang dag
302a5(yum): par spong ba bzhi 'dus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dus so// dbang po lnga 'dus so// stobs lnga 'dus so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dus
302a6(yum): so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dus so// bsam gtan pa ni 'dus so// tshad med pa bzhi
302a7(yum): 'dus so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dus so// rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dus so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
302a8(yum): dgu 'dus so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa meng pa 'dus so// mngon par shes pa rnams 'dus so// ting
302b1(yum): 'dzin rnams 'dus so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'dus so// so so
302b2(yum): dag par rig pa bzhi 'dus so// byams pa chen po 'dus so// snying rje chen po 'dus so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus so// rgyun tu
302b3(yum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so// dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus so// rang byang
302b4(yum): chub 'dus so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs
302b5(yum): spyi bo nas dbang skur bsring brtan par gyur pa'i rgyal po'i dgongs pa'o// yul gyi dgos pa gang cig yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la blon po las su
302b6(yum): bcug ma de'i tshe rgyal po ni rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / yul gyi dgos pa la stong las chung zhing khur bor ba yin rab 'byor de bzhin du nyam thos kyi chos
302b7(yum): sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu
302b8(yum): phyin par 'dus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gi bya ba byed do// rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen po'i phyir nye bar
303a1(yum): gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
303a2(yum): pa 'di ni bya ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha
303a3(yum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba mi mAnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo na gzugs la
303a4(yum): yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par 'chags pa med par/
303a5(yum): nye bar gnas pa'o// 'du shes la yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'du byed la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /
303a6(yum): mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// mig
303a7(yum): la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rna ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par
303a8(yum): che bar gnas pa'o// sA la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lce la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /
303b1(yum): mngon par chags pa med par rtse bar gnas pa'o// lus la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// yid la
303b2(yum): yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa

303b5(yum): dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// ro la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o//
303b6(yum): reg la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// chos la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa
303b7(yum): med par nye bar gnas pa'o// mig gis rnam par shes pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par shes chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o//
303b8(yum): ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su 'dzin pa med/
304a1(yum): pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa
304a2(yum): med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa
304a3(yum): la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang // mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags
304a4(yum): pa med byar gnas pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs
304a5(yum): su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par /
304a6(yum): bar gnas pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs
304a7(yum): su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang
304a8(yum): mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par zhes
304b1(yum): sna'i 'dus kyi ga pa'i rkyer gyis tshor mthongs su 'dzi pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar
304b2(yum): gnas pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
304b3(yum): rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su
304b4(yum): 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// sa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar

304b8(yum): dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// ma rig pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'du byed
304b9(yum): la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa
305a1(yum): / med par nye bar gnas pa'o// ming dang gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// skye mched drug la yongs

341b1(yum): 'byung bzhid 'byung bar 'gyur/ brgyad pa rnams byang bar 'gyur te/ 'byang zhing 'byang bar 'gyur/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams byung bar 'gyur te/ 'byung zhing byang

341b7(yum): 'das kyis sbyar snga ras dong ste/ de dag shin tu yang ma ring po zhig du phyin nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/ 'dod par spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni 'dod pa'i khams la 'di skad

356a4(yum): mi brten pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma 'dzam sen/ khanyan du ma byeng / tshul bzhin du yang la ma byed cing mi bter ba nga / 'jalas pa'i lam yang lag rgyang pa
356a5(yum): 'dri ma ser/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / kha ton du mi byed/ 'phags pa'i bde ba pa'i rnams mi 'drim ston/ khatan du ma bye
356a6(yum): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / bsam gtan rnams mi 'dri mi ster/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / tshad med pa rnams
356a7(yum): mi 'dzi mi ltar/ kha na du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / gzugs med pa'i sems pa 'jug pa rnams mi 'dri mi sen/ kha ma mi byed
356a8(yum): tshul gzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams mi 'jim ser/ kha tor du mo byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / mthar gyis gnas
356b1(yum): pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu mo 'dri mi sten/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i ske snang pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang spar
356b2(yum): pa med pa mi 'ji mi sbyar/ kha tan du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi 'dri mi stor/ kha ton bu byed/ tshul bzhir du yid la
356b3(yum): mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi 'dri mi snyan pa/ kha ter du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rter pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs rnams
356b4(yum): mi 'dri mi ston/ kha tor tu mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing ma rten pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'dri mi sten/ kha tor du mi byed/ tshul bzhir du yid la ma byed
356b5(yum): cing mi rten pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mo 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed bcing mi rten pa dang / byams pa chen po mi 'dri mi ston/
356b6(yum): kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / snying rje chen po mi 'dri ma ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang // sangs
356b7(yum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi 'dri mi sten/ kha tor du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid mi 'dzi mi ster/ kha ton du mi bya
356b8(yum): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// dum bu tha#/ kham po gnyis brgya bcu 'dan pa/
357a1(yum): lam gyis rnam par shes pa nyid mi 'dri ma snyan/ kha dor du mi byed/ tshal bden du yid la mi byed cing ma ngon pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
357a2(yum): 'dri ma sur/ kha tor du po byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mjir pa de dag re bar mdor byang chub las 'am par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa cing mthab par nyan thos
357a3(yum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdul
357a4(yum): par mtshar rgya'i don du dad pa yod cing bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / lhas pham pa dang / dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / mi gdong ba yod cing / cor 'grus mi 'dor ba dag shes
357a5(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o// klag go// kha tor du byed do// rdul bzhin du yid la mo byed cing / rten par byed do// de ltar ra rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma re
357a6(yum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dad pa yong de bzod pa yod/ mos pa yong lhag pa'i bsam pa yang de/ dga' ba yod/ sngo ba yod/ pi gtong ba yod/
357a7(yum): brtson 'grus mi gtong ba yang pa de yir te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyim sa yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtad kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang
357a8(yum): brda 'grus kyi pha rol tu byed pas yongs su bzung bdang bzang ba'i rol du rgyan pas tshangs su bzung bar tshul khrims kyi pha ral tu phyin pas sangs su bzung ba
357b1(yum): med kyis yong la / 'dus rgyam sto pacan kyis yongs ca
357b2(yum): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / byi rang sang pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / snang ba nyid
357b3(yum): seng pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong
357b4(yum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis sa yongs su bzung ba dang / thog ma tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
357b5(yum): bzung ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhir stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis
357b6(yum): yangs su bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa stong
357b7(yum): ba nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
357b8(yum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzang ba dang / dbang pos
357b9(yum): yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad bas
359a1(yum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor dam pa sang pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
359a2(yum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus ma byas song pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
359a3(yum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa snang ba nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
359a4(yum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma ba
359a5(yum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid spangs su ma bzung /
359a6(yum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spang ba rnams kyis yengs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su
359a7(yum): dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stabs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yar lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i
359a8(yum): yan lag rnam chung pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bram gtan rnams kyis yongs sum bzung / char
359b1(yum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar
359b2(yum): kyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgus yangs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sa stong pa nyid dang mtshar ma med pa dang / spor ba med pas yangs su ma bzung /
359b3(yum): mngon par shes pa lngas yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sde rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs
359b4(yum): pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos
359b5(yum): yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis
359b6(yum): yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub sems dpa'
359b7(yum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma 'dir nye nor 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
359b8(yum): kyi bu mo de dag gi bar ma 'dor nye zhor 'byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dkyi sa'o// rab 'byar de lta ste dper na skyes pa 'am/ bud med
359b9(yum): la la nig bum pas sa lags par btang bas chu rang ngam/ 'tshangam/ mtsha' 'am/ khan panas rgyarnan/ rab 'byung mchubaba'i bum pa 'i ba ba
359b10(yum): khyim du phyin par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dang ba yang yang
359b11(yum): bzod pa yang yang / mos pa yang yong / lhag pa'i bsapa pa yang yang / dga' ba yang yang / zla ba yang yang / mi gtong ba yang yang / bcan 'grus kyi
359b12(yum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyir pas yongs su bzu/ tshul khrims ca pha rol tu bya bas yongs su dzu srir pa'i pha rol tu phyi
359b13(yum): bzung ba'i gyis yo su bzung/ rtsi dang ba sa rangs su bzung / snang ba sa pan kyis
359b14(yum): kyis yongs su bzung / don dang pa song pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su babyung / 'dus su byas snang ba
359b15(yum): grangs sa bzus 'a sa 'angos pa sa samangs su bzang / yang pa la yang mas la ya nga par po song na rgyam
359b16(yum): su bzung rang ba'i gang panyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid sang bcing kas yongs su badz+ram
359b17(yum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs sum bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs sum bzung / mthar
359b18(yum): gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgus yangs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sra stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung /

359b24(yum): kyi bu mo de dag gi bar ma 'dir nye zhor 'byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor de lta ste dper na skyes pa 'am/ bud med
360a1(yum): #la la nig bum pas sa lags par btang bas chu lung ngam/ 'tsho'am/ mtshe'u 'am/ khan ba nas chu chan/ rab 'byar chu chub 'i bum par 'tsha ba ba

360a3(yum): bzod pa yang yang/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yang / dga' ba yang yang / smra ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yod/ brtsor 'grus kyi pha
360a4(yum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi pas yongs su bzung skyer ba'i pha rol tu phyin ras

360a7(yum): yangs sa bzab mtha' las 'angos po snang pa nyi sa yangs su bzung / zag yang tha ma meng nga kyis yangs su nga/ dang pa mang po gong parji rgyamam
360a8(yum): su bzung / rang bzhir sang pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid srung pa nyid kyis yongs su bzlam
360b1(yum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos pa med pa stong ba nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po med pa

360b4(yum): su bzung / 'phags pa'i bder pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtar gyis yongs su bzung / tshad med pas yongasu bzung / gzugs bong pa'i sgrib par 'jug
360b5(yum): pas yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa'i
360b6(yum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan pa med pa dang spod pa med pas yongs su bzung / mngoran par shes pas yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung / gzungs kyi
360b7(yum): yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su
360b8(yum): bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje cher pos yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yongs su bzung / thams cad
361a1(yum): cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / lam gyi rnab pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyis yongs su bzu
361a2(yum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba de ri 'di lta ste/ nyan kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bar ma 'dor nye zer mi 'gyur te/ mnyes ma nyams par
361a3(yum): bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mdor par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper ra/ rgya mtsho'i grum spabs shing / zag lda
361a4(yum): ma byas par rdzas bcug ste/ tshul btang ra rab 'byor gru de ri ba nig par 'gyur te/ gru yang log shig/ rdzas kyang log shig tu song ras/ de ltar ra chong pa de tha ba
361a5(yum): mkhas pas gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / rirang po che chen po las yongs su pang bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

361a7(yum): yong/ slob yang yod/ mi btong ba yang yang / brjor 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod meng kyi de shes rab kyi pha rol tu byad pas yangs su ma bzung / @
361a8(yum): mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung / bsapa gtang pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su babazung / brjor 'grus kyi pha rol phyir pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod par ba
361b1(yum): byin pas yongs sum bzung / tshul khribs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyir pas yongs su ma bzung / nang song pa nyid kyis
361b2(yum): yongs sum bzung / bye stong pa nyid kyis yongs su pra bzung / phyi rang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / spang pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su pa bzung / chem
361b3(yum): panyid kyis yangs sum bzung / don ras pasod pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas snang pa nyid kyis yongs su ba bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis

361b7(yum): yongs su ba bzung / dngos po meng ba'i ngo bo 'ad snang ba nyid kyis yongs sum bzung / drar pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams
361b8(yum): gyis yongs su mi bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yangs su ma bzung

362a3(yum): yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su mi bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i skabs par 'jug pa dgus yangs su pa bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sa
